sentences.en: Production: monomer boron, Danhuapeng, boron anhydride, without detectable; Hydrochloric acid , Yean, ammonia water.

sentences.en: The Christmas season always made Bonnie yean for those halcyon days of her youth.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节长使波尼怀念她年轻时平静、愉快的日子.

sentences.en: This day, I'm always miss yean for the past and old friend.
sentences.cn: 这一天, 我总是想起过去,万分思念我的老朋友.
